title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3906/86 of 22 December 1986 amending Regulation (EEC) No 95/69 as regards certain marketing standards for eggs
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3906/86
of 22 December 1986
amending Regulation (EEC) No 95/69 regards certain marketing standards for eggs
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 56.
(2) OJ No L 323, 18. 11. 1986, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 13, 18. 1. 1969, p. 13.
(4) OJ No L 356, 31. 12. 1985, p. 64.
